Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Requires the division for small-business to publish a small business compliance guide
Summary: Requires the division for small-business to publish a small business compliance guide and post such guide to the division for small-business's website.
LawCode: Amd ยง202-e, St Ad Proc Act; add ยง138-a, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act and the economic development law, in relation to requiring the division for small-business to publish a small business compliance guide
